options.content:
# ðŸƒ Garmin Health & Fitness Dashboard

Self-hosted analytics built with **GarminDB + Grafana** on k3s. Includes metrics Garmin Connect doesn't show: aerobic decoupling, efficiency factor, summit log.

targets.queryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_activities.db' AS activities_db;

SELECT 
  a.name AS peak,
  ROUND(MAX(r.altitude), 0) AS summit_m,
  date(a.start_time) AS date,
  ROUND(a.distance, 1) AS km,
  ROUND(a.ascent, 0) AS gain_m,
  a.moving_time AS duration
FROM activities_db.activities a
JOIN activities_db.activity_records r ON a.activity_id = r.activity_id
WHERE a.sport = 'hiking'
  AND a.start_time BETWEEN '${__from:date:iso}' AND '${__to:date:iso}'
GROUP BY a.activity_id
ORDER BY summit_m DESC
LIMIT 15;
targets.rawQueryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_activities.db' AS activities_db;

SELECT 
  a.name AS peak,
  ROUND(MAX(r.altitude), 0) AS summit_m,
  date(a.start_time) AS date,
  ROUND(a.distance, 1) AS km,
  ROUND(a.ascent, 0) AS gain_m,
  a.moving_time AS duration
FROM activities_db.activities a
JOIN activities_db.activity_records r ON a.activity_id = r.activity_id
WHERE a.sport = 'hiking'
  AND a.start_time BETWEEN '${__from:date:iso}' AND '${__to:date:iso}'
GROUP BY a.activity_id
ORDER BY summit_m DESC
LIMIT 15;

targets.queryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_activities.db' AS activities_db;

SELECT 
  strftime('%Y-%m', start_time) AS time,
  ROUND(SUM(ascent), 0) AS elevation
FROM activities_db.activities
WHERE sport = 'hiking'
  AND start_time BETWEEN '${__from:date:iso}' AND '${__to:date:iso}'
GROUP BY strftime('%Y-%m', start_time)
ORDER BY time;
targets.rawQueryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_activities.db' AS activities_db;

SELECT 
  strftime('%Y-%m', start_time) AS time,
  ROUND(SUM(ascent), 0) AS elevation
FROM activities_db.activities
WHERE sport = 'hiking'
  AND start_time BETWEEN '${__from:date:iso}' AND '${__to:date:iso}'
GROUP BY strftime('%Y-%m', start_time)
ORDER BY time;

targets.queryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_activities.db' AS activities_db;

SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', start_time) AS INTEGER) AS time,
  ROUND(ascent / NULLIF((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || moving_time) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 3600.0, 0), 0) AS ascent_rate
FROM activities_db.activities
WHERE sport = 'hiking'
  AND ascent > 0
  AND start_time BETWEEN '${__from:date:iso}' AND '${__to:date:iso}'
ORDER BY time;
targets.rawQueryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_activities.db' AS activities_db;

SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', start_time) AS INTEGER) AS time,
  ROUND(ascent / NULLIF((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || moving_time) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 3600.0, 0), 0) AS ascent_rate
FROM activities_db.activities
WHERE sport = 'hiking'
  AND ascent > 0
  AND start_time BETWEEN '${__from:date:iso}' AND '${__to:date:iso}'
ORDER BY time;

targets.queryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_activities.db' AS activities_db;

SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', start_time) AS INTEGER) AS time,
  ROUND(distance, 1) AS distance_km,
  ROUND(ascent, 0) AS elevation_m
FROM activities_db.activities
WHERE sport = 'hiking'
  AND distance > 0
  AND ascent > 0
  AND start_time BETWEEN '${__from:date:iso}' AND '${__to:date:iso}';
targets.rawQueryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_activities.db' AS activities_db;

SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', start_time) AS INTEGER) AS time,
  ROUND(distance, 1) AS distance_km,
  ROUND(ascent, 0) AS elevation_m
FROM activities_db.activities
WHERE sport = 'hiking'
  AND distance > 0
  AND ascent > 0
  AND start_time BETWEEN '${__from:date:iso}' AND '${__to:date:iso}';

panels.description: Your highest summit based on max altitude recorded during hiking activities
panels.title: ðŸ”ï¸ Highest Summit

targets.queryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_activities.db' AS act;

SELECT ROUND(AVG(
  (distance / NULLIF(
    (strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || moving_time) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 3600.0
  , 0)) / NULLIF(avg_hr, 0)
), 3) AS value
FROM act.activities
WHERE sport = 'running'
  AND start_time >= date('now', '-30 days')
  AND distance > 0
  AND avg_hr > 0;
targets.rawQueryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_activities.db' AS act;

SELECT ROUND(AVG(
  (distance / NULLIF(
    (strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || moving_time) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 3600.0
  , 0)) / NULLIF(avg_hr, 0)
), 3) AS value
FROM act.activities
WHERE sport = 'running'
  AND start_time >= date('now', '-30 days')
  AND distance > 0
  AND avg_hr > 0;

targets.queryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_activities.db' AS act;

SELECT
CAST(strftime('%s', start_time) AS INTEGER) AS time,
ROUND(
(distance / NULLIF(
(strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || substr(moving_time,1,8)) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 3600.0
, 0)) / NULLIF(avg_hr, 0),
3) AS value
FROM act.activities
WHERE sport = 'running'
AND distance > 0
AND avg_hr > 0
AND time BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
ORDER BY time;
targets.rawQueryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_activities.db' AS act;

SELECT
CAST(strftime('%s', start_time) AS INTEGER) AS time,
ROUND(
(distance / NULLIF(
(strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || substr(moving_time,1,8)) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 3600.0
, 0)) / NULLIF(avg_hr, 0),
3) AS value
FROM act.activities
WHERE sport = 'running'
AND distance > 0
AND avg_hr > 0
AND time BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
ORDER BY time;

targets.queryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_activities.db' AS act;

SELECT
date(start_time, 'weekday 1', '-7 days') AS time,
ROUND(SUM(distance), 2) AS value
FROM act.activities
WHERE sport = 'running'
AND start_time BETWEEN '${__from:date:iso}' AND '${__to:date:iso}'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;
targets.rawQueryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_activities.db' AS act;

SELECT
date(start_time, 'weekday 1', '-7 days') AS time,
ROUND(SUM(distance), 2) AS value
FROM act.activities
WHERE sport = 'running'
AND start_time BETWEEN '${__from:date:iso}' AND '${__to:date:iso}'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

targets.queryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_activities.db' AS act;

SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', start_time) AS INTEGER) AS time,
  training_effect AS aerobic,
  anaerobic_training_effect AS anaerobic
FROM act.activities
WHERE sport = 'running'
  AND start_time BETWEEN '${__from:date:iso}' AND '${__to:date:iso}'
ORDER BY time;
targets.rawQueryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_activities.db' AS act;

SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', start_time) AS INTEGER) AS time,

FROM act.activities
WHERE sport = 'running'
  AND start_time BETWEEN '${__from:date:iso}' AND '${__to:date:iso}'

targets.queryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_activities.db' AS act;

SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', start_time) AS INTEGER) AS time,
  avg_cadence
FROM act.activities
WHERE sport = 'running'
  AND avg_cadence > 0
  AND start_time BETWEEN '${__from:date:iso}' AND '${__to:date:iso}'
ORDER BY time;
targets.rawQueryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_activities.db' AS act;

SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', start_time) AS INTEGER) AS time,
  avg_cadence
FROM act.activities
WHERE sport = 'running'
  AND avg_cadence > 0
  AND start_time BETWEEN '${__from:date:iso}' AND '${__to:date:iso}'
ORDER BY time;

targets.queryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_activities.db' AS act;

WITH run_data AS (
  SELECT 
    r.activity_id,
    a.name,
    a.start_time,
    r.record,
    r.hr,
    r.speed,
    COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY r.activity_id) AS total_records,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY r.activity_id ORDER BY r.record) AS rn
  FROM act.activity_records r
  JOIN act.activities a ON r.activity_id = a.activity_id
  WHERE a.sport = 'running'
    AND r.hr > 0 
    AND r.speed > 0
    AND a.distance > 5
    AND LOWER(a.name) NOT LIKE '%sprint%'
    AND LOWER(a.name) NOT LIKE '%interval%'
    AND LOWER(a.name) NOT LIKE '%tempo%'
    AND LOWER(a.name) NOT LIKE '%threshold%'
    AND LOWER(a.name) NOT LIKE '%speed%'
),
halves AS (
  SELECT 
    activity_id,
    start_time,
    CASE WHEN rn <= total_records/2 THEN 'first' ELSE 'second' END AS half,
    AVG(speed) AS avg_speed,
    AVG(hr) AS avg_hr
  FROM run_data
  GROUP BY activity_id, start_time, half
),
decoupling AS (
  SELECT 
    f.start_time,
    ROUND(((f.avg_speed / f.avg_hr) - (s.avg_speed / s.avg_hr)) / (f.avg_speed / f.avg_hr) * 100, 2) AS decoupling_pct
  FROM halves f
  JOIN halves s ON f.activity_id = s.activity_id AND f.half = 'first' AND s.half = 'second'
)
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', start_time) AS INTEGER) AS time,
  decoupling_pct
FROM decoupling
WHERE decoupling_pct >= 0
ORDER BY time;
targets.rawQueryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_activities.db' AS act;

WITH run_data AS (
  SELECT 
    r.activity_id,
    a.name,
    a.start_time,
    r.record,
    r.hr,
    r.speed,
    COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY r.activity_id) AS total_records,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY r.activity_id ORDER BY r.record) AS rn
  FROM act.activity_records r
  JOIN act.activities a ON r.activity_id = a.activity_id
  WHERE a.sport = 'running'
    AND r.hr > 0 
    AND r.speed > 0
    AND a.distance > 5
    AND LOWER(a.name) NOT LIKE '%sprint%'
    AND LOWER(a.name) NOT LIKE '%interval%'
    AND LOWER(a.name) NOT LIKE '%tempo%'
    AND LOWER(a.name) NOT LIKE '%threshold%'
    AND LOWER(a.name) NOT LIKE '%speed%'
),
halves AS (
  SELECT 
    activity_id,
    start_time,
    CASE WHEN rn <= total_records/2 THEN 'first' ELSE 'second' END AS half,
    AVG(speed) AS avg_speed,
    AVG(hr) AS avg_hr
  FROM run_data
  GROUP BY activity_id, start_time, half
),
decoupling AS (
  SELECT 
    f.start_time,
    ROUND(((f.avg_speed / f.avg_hr) - (s.avg_speed / s.avg_hr)) / (f.avg_speed / f.avg_hr) * 100, 2) AS decoupling_pct
  FROM halves f
  JOIN halves s ON f.activity_id = s.activity_id AND f.half = 'first' AND s.half = 'second'
)
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', start_time) AS INTEGER) AS time,
  decoupling_pct
FROM decoupling
WHERE decoupling_pct >= 0
ORDER BY time;

targets.queryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_monitoring.db' AS monitoring;

WITH daily AS (
  SELECT 
    date(timestamp) AS day,
    MIN(heart_rate) AS resting_hr
  FROM monitoring.monitoring_hr
  WHERE strftime('%H', timestamp) BETWEEN '05' AND '08'
  GROUP BY date(timestamp)
)
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', day) AS INTEGER) AS time,
  resting_hr,
  ROUND(AVG(resting_hr) OVER (ORDER BY day ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW), 1) AS rhr_7d_avg
FROM daily
ORDER BY day;
targets.rawQueryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_monitoring.db' AS monitoring;

WITH daily AS (
  SELECT 
    date(timestamp) AS day,
    MIN(heart_rate) AS resting_hr
  FROM monitoring.monitoring_hr
  WHERE strftime('%H', timestamp) BETWEEN '05' AND '08'
  GROUP BY date(timestamp)
)
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', day) AS INTEGER) AS time,
  resting_hr,
  ROUND(AVG(resting_hr) OVER (ORDER BY day ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW), 1) AS rhr_7d_avg
FROM daily
ORDER BY day;

targets.queryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_activities.db' AS act;

SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', start_time) AS INTEGER) AS time,
  avg_hr,
  max_hr
FROM act.activities
WHERE sport = 'running'
  AND avg_hr > 0
  AND start_time BETWEEN '${__from:date:iso}' AND '${__to:date:iso}'
ORDER BY time;
targets.rawQueryText:

ORDER BY time;

targets.queryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_summary.db' AS summary;

SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', day) AS INTEGER) AS time,
  bb_max,
  bb_min
FROM summary.days_summary
WHERE bb_max IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY day;
targets.rawQueryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_summary.db' AS summary;

targets.rawQueryText:

targets.queryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_summary.db' AS summary;

SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', day) AS INTEGER) AS time,
  ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || moderate_activity_time) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 60.0, 0) AS moderate,
  ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || vigorous_activity_time) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 60.0, 0) AS vigorous
FROM summary.days_summary
ORDER BY day;
targets.rawQueryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_summary.db' AS summary;

SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', day) AS INTEGER) AS time,
  ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || moderate_activity_time) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 60.0, 0) AS moderate,
  ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || vigorous_activity_time) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 60.0, 0) AS vigorous
FROM summary.days_summary
ORDER BY day;

targets.queryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_summary.db' AS summary;

SELECT 
  ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || moderate_activity_time) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 60.0, 0) +
  ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || vigorous_activity_time) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 60.0, 0) AS value
FROM summary.days_summary
ORDER BY day DESC
LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin_summary.db' AS summary;

SELECT 
  ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || moderate_activity_time) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 60.0, 0) +
  ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || vigorous_activity_time) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 60.0, 0) AS value
FROM summary.days_summary
ORDER BY day DESC
LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin.db' AS garmin;

SELECT ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || total_sleep) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 3600.0, 1) AS value
FROM garmin.sleep
WHERE total_sleep IS NOT NULL
  AND total_sleep != '00:00:00.000000'
ORDER BY day DESC
LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin.db' AS garmin;

SELECT ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || total_sleep) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 3600.0, 1) AS value
FROM garmin.sleep
WHERE total_sleep IS NOT NULL
  AND total_sleep != '00:00:00.000000'
ORDER BY day DESC
LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin.db' AS garmin;

SELECT 
  ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || deep_sleep) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 3600.0, 2) AS deep,
  ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || light_sleep) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 3600.0, 2) AS light,
  ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || rem_sleep) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 3600.0, 2) AS rem,
  ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || awake) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 3600.0, 2) AS awake
FROM garmin.sleep
WHERE total_sleep IS NOT NULL
  AND total_sleep != '00:00:00.000000'
ORDER BY day DESC
LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin.db' AS garmin;

SELECT 
  ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || deep_sleep) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 3600.0, 2) AS deep,
  ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || light_sleep) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 3600.0, 2) AS light,
  ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || rem_sleep) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 3600.0, 2) AS rem,
  ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || awake) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 3600.0, 2) AS awake
FROM garmin.sleep
WHERE total_sleep IS NOT NULL
  AND total_sleep != '00:00:00.000000'
ORDER BY day DESC
LIMIT 1;

  COUNT(*) as nights
FROM garmin.sleep
WHERE qualifier IS NOT NULL
  AND day BETWEEN '${__from:date:iso}' AND '${__to:date:iso}'
GROUP BY qualifier
ORDER BY nights DESC;

ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin.db' AS garmin;

SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', day) AS INTEGER) AS time,
  ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || deep_sleep) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 3600.0, 2) AS deep,
  ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || light_sleep) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 3600.0, 2) AS light,
  ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || rem_sleep) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 3600.0, 2) AS rem,
  ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || awake) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 3600.0, 2) AS awake
FROM garmin.sleep
WHERE total_sleep IS NOT NULL
  AND total_sleep != '00:00:00.000000'
ORDER BY day;
targets.rawQueryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin.db' AS garmin;

SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', day) AS INTEGER) AS time,
  ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || deep_sleep) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 3600.0, 2) AS deep,
  ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || light_sleep) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 3600.0, 2) AS light,
  ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || rem_sleep) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 3600.0, 2) AS rem,
  ROUND((strftime('%s', '1970-01-01 ' || awake) - strftime('%s', '1970-01-01')) / 3600.0, 2) AS awake
FROM garmin.sleep
WHERE total_sleep IS NOT NULL
  AND total_sleep != '00:00:00.000000'
ORDER BY day;

targets.queryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin.db' AS garmin;

SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', day) AS INTEGER) AS time,
  score AS sleep_score
FROM garmin.sleep
WHERE score IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY day;
targets.rawQueryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin.db' AS garmin;

SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', day) AS INTEGER) AS time,
  score AS sleep_score
FROM garmin.sleep
WHERE score IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY day;

targets.queryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin.db' AS garmin;

SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', date(timestamp)) AS INTEGER) AS time,
  ROUND(AVG(stress), 0) AS avg_daily_stress
FROM garmin.stress
WHERE stress > 0
GROUP BY date(timestamp)
ORDER BY time;
targets.rawQueryText:
ATTACH '/data/HealthData/DBs/garmin.db' AS garmin;

SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', date(timestamp)) AS INTEGER) AS time,
  ROUND(AVG(stress), 0) AS avg_daily_stress
FROM garmin.stress
WHERE stress > 0
GROUP BY date(timestamp)
ORDER BY time;
